data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Lorient.
Lorient's Fabien Lemoine gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
Thomas Monconduit (Lorient) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 5, Nice have a goal kick.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Lorient at Allianz Rivera.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient.
Armand Lauriente for Lorient gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, Aurelien Petit awards Nice a goal kick.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in for Nice in their own half.
In the minute 13, In Nice, Terem Moffi of Lorient is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Terem Moffi for Lorient drives towards goal at Allianz Rivera. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Lorient at Allianz Rivera.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 17, Nice's Rony Lopes has run offside.
Throw-in Nice.
Goal! Jordan Lotomba gives Nice a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 18, That's a fine assist from Jeff Reine-Adelaide.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Nice.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 27, Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Nice's half.
Lorient drives forward and Quentin Boisgard gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Nice.
In the minute 34, Jeff Reine-Adelaide puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Hicham Boudaoui with an assist there.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, In Nice Lorient attack through Thomas Monconduit. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 37, Lorient are pushing forward but Quentin Boisgard's finish is wide of the goal.
Nice have a goal kick.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 38, Julien Laporte (Lorient) has received a first yellow card.
Aurelien Petit signals a Nice throw-in in Lorient's half.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 41, Aurelien Petit awards Nice a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Lorient needs to be cautious. Nice have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 44, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
At Allianz Rivera, Thomas Monconduit has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, Quentin Boisgard of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Jeff Reine-Adelaide is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Allianz Rivera.
Lorient's Fabien Lemoine has been booked in Nice.
Jeff Reine-Adelaide is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second half has started at Allianz Rivera.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Lorient make their first substitution with Yoane Wissa replacing Laurent Abergel.
In the minute 46, Hassane Kamara is on a sub for Youcef Atal for Nice.
Lorient's Yoane Wissa gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Rivera. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Lorient are back in the match in Nice. Terem Moffi has scored to make it 2-1.
Great play from Quentin Boisgard to set up the goal.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Lorient.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Throw-in for Nice in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 58, Nice to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Aurelien Petit awards the away team a throw-in.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Lorient's Quentin Boisgard is on target but unsuccessful.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
In the minute 62, Walter Benitez has recovered and rejoins the match in Nice.
Aurelien Petit waits before resuming play because Walter Benitez for Nice is still down.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Jonathan Delaplace is replacing Jerome Hergault for the away team.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Terem Moffi with Adrian Grbic.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Lorient's Armand Lauriente breaks free at Allianz Rivera. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Nice make their second substitution with Dan Ndoye replacing Rony Lopes.
In the minute 67, Throw-in Nice.
Throw-in for Nice at Allianz Rivera.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 69, Lorient pushes forward through Adrian Grbic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Aurelien Petit awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Nice.
Free kick in a good position for Lorient!
Lorient's Armand Lauriente fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
In the minute 73, Hicham Boudaoui (Nice) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nice.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Stanley N`Soki is on a sub for Flavius Daniliuc for Nice.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
In the minute 76, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Aurelien Petit.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Yoane Wissa (Lorient) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 78, In Nice Lorient attack through Quentin Boisgard. The finish is off target, however.
Aurelien Petit awards Nice a goal kick.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 79, Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Lorient have been awarded a penalty in Nice...
The home team replace Hicham Boudaoui with Alexis Claude-Maurice.
In the minute 81, Nice are down to 10 men after Robson Bambu has been shown a red card.
Adrian Grbic scores from the spot and Lorient draw level at Allianz Rivera.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Nice.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Enzo Le Fee is replacing Thomas Monconduit for the away team.
In the minute 84, Lorient's Adrian Grbic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Aurelien Petit signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Nice in the half of Lorient.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Aurelien Petit signals a Lorient throw-in in Nice's half.
In Nice a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Nice) strikes at Allianz Rivera but his header is cleared.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Jordan Lotomba is booked for the home team.
Umut Bozok is replacing Quentin Boisgard for Lorient at Allianz Rivera.
Enzo Le Fee (Lorient) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jeff Reine-Adelaide for Nice has been booked by Aurelien Petit and receives a first yellow card.
